name: Santa Close: AI-visual visual novel
description:
Horror game about finding endings in the form of a visual novel about Santa Claus. Try to find all the endings in this visual novel where each image is generated by neural networks and where each of your actions affects further progress (well, or not each). Some features will only open if the right conditions are met in this horror game with elements of humor. Yes, I'm just a genius writing descriptions for games man. In short, play plz and have fun!

How to start?
Just download the archive, unzip it and run the game!

How to change language?
Go to the 3rd menu button and there it is!

In this game:

  • 14 endings
  • 761 dialogue blocks
  • 5,627 words
  • 33,917 characters
  • 44 menus
  • 23 screens.
